name: 忧郁的loli
introduction: Galgame资源搜索,可以搜索一些Galgame资源
request: https://www.kkgal.com/?s=[$key]&submit=@charset->UTF-8@header->Content-Type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=UTF-8@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 4.4.2; Nexus 4 Build/KOT49H) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/81.0.4044.138 Mobile Safari/537.36

search.title: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div.title-article > h1 > a');}
search.cover: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div.alert > p > a > img@attr->src');}
search.url: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div.title-article > h1 > a@attr->href')+'@header->Content-Type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=UTF-8@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 4.4.2; Nexus 4 Build/KOT49H) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/81.0.4044.138 Mobile Safari/537.36';}

url.url: function Main(html){var data = strmiddle(jsoup(html,'div.panel-body > a > button@attr->onclick'),'\'','\'');var key;if(html.indexOf('提取密码')!=-1){key = '@js->javascript:document.querySelector("input[type=text]").value = "'+jsoup(html,'div.panel-footer > b:nth-child(1) > span > span')+'"';}return data+key;}
